topic.title: Solution Bundle: Solution Admin Host (SAH) Networking
topic.shortdesc: The Solution Admin Host has internal bridged networks for the Virtual Machines.

body.p:
The Solution Admin is physically connected to the following networks:
Public Network used for:
Inbound Access -
HTTP/HTTPS access to OpenStack Foreman Installer VM
HTTP/HTTPS access to Ceph Installer VM
Optional - SSH Access to OpenStack Installer and Ceph Installer VM's
Outbound Access
HTTP/HTTPS access for Ceph and Red Hat Updates
Provision Network - Used by the OpenStack Foreman Installer VM to servie DHCP to all hosts, provsioner each host, and act a proxy for the host to do updates with.
Storage Network - Used by the Ceph Deployer VM to provision, monitor and manage the Ceph Cluster.

The figure lays out how the networks are brigded inside the Solution Admin Host. As both the Provision and Storage networks come in on the same physical interface 802.1q tagging is configured on the SAH and corresponding Switch ports. This Reference Architecture does not cover any Security aspects, thus the appropriate Network and Security teams should be involved before connecting any machine to the externally accessible networks.
